resources.string: Its just not about Paid Free it\'s something more.
It\'s about delivering quality content, weather it is a deal, news, code or sarcasm
I will feed your thirst for content you demand, sit back and enjoy your drink
Unlike others, I will not monitor your activity over your device, feel free as in freedom
I will send you notifications, whenever I will have something interesting and soothing
I am small developer, not planning to earn so no Ads but, I want it to be my full time thing, if you like it please encourage others to use it.
